ProteinName	Protachykinin-1 (PPT) [Cleaved into: Substance P; Neurokinin A (NKA) (Neuromedin L) (Substance K); Neuropeptide K (NPK); Neuropeptide gamma; C-terminal-flanking peptide]
GeneName	TAC1 NKA NKNA TAC2
Length	111
Function	Tachykinins are active peptides which excite neurons, evoke behavioral responses, are potent vasodilators and secretagogues, and contract (directly or indirectly) many smooth muscles.
